actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozella Frey against the United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgements were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 10th Circuit.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozella Frey against the United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgements were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 10th Circuit.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of those members of the class action suit, Mozella Frey against the United States of America, filed in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma, for whom judgements were entered by such court, but later vacated by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 10th Circuit.
